name: admin_divisions
description: Find administrative divisions, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known divisions with a population of at least 1000

location.description: Only divisions near this location. Latitude/longitude in ISO-6709 format: ±DD.DDDD±DDD.DDDD
location.title: Location

radius.description: The location radius within which to find divisions Default: 0
radius.title: Radius

distanceUnit.description: The unit of distance to use: MI | KM
distanceUnit.title: Distanceunit

countryIds.description: Only divisions in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData ids)
countryIds.title: Countryids

excludedCountryIds.description: Only divisions NOT in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData ids)
excludedCountryIds.title: Excludedcountryids

minPopulation.description: Only divisions having at least this population Default: 0
minPopulation.title: Minpopulation

maxPopulation.description: Only divisions having no more than this population Default: 0
maxPopulation.title: Maxpopulation

namePrefix.description: Only divisions whose names start with this prefix. If languageCode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name as it appears in that language.
namePrefix.title: Nameprefix

namePrefixDefaultLangResults.description: When name-prefix matching, whether or not to match on names in the default language if a non-default language is requested
namePrefixDefaultLangResults.title: Nameprefixdefaultlangresults

includeDeleted.description: Whether to include any divisions marked deleted: ALL | SINCE_YESTERDAY | SINCE_LAST_WEEK | NONE
includeDeleted.title: Includedeleted

limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve Default: 0
limit.title: Limit

offset.description: The zero-ary offset into the results Default: 0
offset.title: Offset

sort.description: How to sort the results. Format: ±SORT_FIELD,±SORT_FIELD where SORT_FIELD = countryCode | elevation | name | population
sort.title: Sort

name: city_details
description: Get the details for a specific city, including location coordinates, population, and elevation above sea-level (if available).

name: city_located_in
description: Get the details for the containing populated place (e.g., its county or other administrative division), including location coordinates, population, and elevation above sea-level (if available). Currently, this data is highly dependent on whether the Wikidata **locatedIn** relation is properly defined. If you see an issue, please propose a change to the corresponding Wikidata entry.

description: Get the city current date-time in ISO-6801 format: yyyyMMdd'T'HHmmssZ

name: city_distance
description: Gets the distance to the given city.

distanceUnit.title: Distanceunit

description: Get the city current time in ISO-8601 format: HHmmss.SSSZ
